title: Nomadic Rituals & Tome Split Single 2015 (320 - Sludge/Doom)
description:
Two Doom/Sludge bands from Northern Ireland have come together to self release a split single of slow and heavy tracks. Recorded early last year the two bands worked together to self produce the 12" which show cases their two distinct musical styles. In doing this they also took on the task of creating the entire record themselves with hand drawn illustrations and screen printed sleeves.

Nomadic Rituals: The Great Dying - 14:14
Tome: Bone Divinations - 11:02
Total Running Time: 25:17

Both tracks recorded and mixed by Niall Doran at Start Together Studios, Belfast.

Released: 28 February 2015

NOMADIC RITUALS is
C Carson - Bass/Vocals/Synth
P Hunter - Guitar/Vocals
M Smyth - Drums/Sample

TOME is
M Salters - Guitar/Vocals
D McIlhatton - Bass
C McAuley - Drums
